jam.sort
Class StorageDaemon

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Thread
        |
        +--jam.global.GoodThread
              |
              +--jam.sort.StorageDaemon
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiskDaemon, TapeDaemon
public abstract class StorageDaemon
extends GoodThread

General class to read and write event data streams from/to storage. For online takes events from a RingBuffer and writes them out to a storage device. For offline takes events from a storage device and pipes them to an EventInputStream.

Since:
JDK 1.1
Version:
0.5
Author:
Ken Swartz

openEventInputListFile

public abstract boolean openEventInputListFile()
Open the next file in the list, does not throw exception so it can be easily put in loop. Reports error itself if it could not open file.
Returns:
true if successful, false if not

closeEventInputListFile

public abstract boolean closeEventInputListFile()
Closes the current file in the list, does not throw exception so it can be easily put in loop. Reports error itself if it could not close the file.
Returns:
true if successful, false if not
